SELECT srm.road_id, road_no, road_name, start_lng, start_lat, end_lng, end_lat, remarks, delete_state, expressway_name,direction,start_mark,end_mark,storey,road_long,road_weight,road_deep, rn.allXuQiu, gy.allGongYing FROM sys_road_mgn srm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM (pd_need) allXuQiu, road_id FROM plan_production_collection WHERE delete_state = 1 GROUP BY road_id ) rn ON srm.road_id = rn.road_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM (sfmm.weight) allGongYing, srm.id FROM site_field_material_mgt sfmm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM batch_mgt bm WHERE bm.delete_state != 0 ) bm ON sfmm.batch_id = bm.id LEFT JOIN sys_formulation_management sfm ON bm.pitch_type = sfm.fl_id AND sfm.delete_state != 0 LEFT JOIN site_construction srm ON bm.site_id = srm.id AND srm.delete_state != 0 WHERE sfmm.delete_state != 0 AND sfmm.batch_id = bm.id GROUP BY srm.id ) gy ON gy.road_id = srm.road_id
srm.delete_state != 0

SELECT srm.*, delete_state, direction, CASE WHEN rn.allXuQiu is null then 0 ELSE Convert(decimal(18,2),allXuQiu/1000) end as allXuQiu, CASE WHEN gy.allGongYing is null then 0 ELSE Convert(decimal(18,2),allGongYing/1000) end as allGongYing FROM site_construction srm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM (pd_need) allXuQiu, site_id FROM plan_production_collection WHERE delete_state = 1 GROUP BY site_id ) rn ON srm.id = rn.site_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM (sfmm.weight) allGongYing, srm.id FROM site_field_material_mgt sfmm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM batch_mgt bm WHERE bm.delete_state != 0 ) bm ON sfmm.batch_id = bm.id LEFT JOIN sys_formulation_management sfm ON bm.pitch_type = sfm.fl_id AND sfm.delete_state != 0 LEFT JOIN site_construction srm ON bm.site_id = srm.id AND srm.delete_state != 0 WHERE sfmm.delete_state != 0 AND sfmm.batch_id = bm.id GROUP BY srm.id ) gy ON gy.id = srm.id WHERE srm.state=#{state}
